entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
